h1_38: Henry Ford Health/Henry Ford Hospital Program
p_65: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_69: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_80: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_98: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_101: Our faculty are passionate about teaching and mentoring, providing guidance throughout training. We have a broad curriculum and subspecialty clinics which include clinical derm, dermpath, surgery, pediatric derm, Mohs surgery, cosmetics, CTCL, Multicultural Dermatology, Hidradenitis Suppurativa, and Photomed which allows you to gain expertise in diverse areas. Our multispecialty clinics collaborate w/rheumatology, pediatric allergy, and psychiatry, foster a holistic approach to patient care.
